mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(ALARM_NO) FROM SR_ALARM sa, SR s,SR_STTS st, HR h WHERE sa.SR_NO = s.SR_NO(+) AND s.STTS_NO = st.STTS_NO(+) AND s.SR_NO = h.SR_NO(+)
AND sa.SR_NO like #{sysNo} AND sa.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND s.STTS_NO != 8 AND s.STTS_NO != 10
AND sa.SR_NO like #{sysNo} AND s.STTS_NO != 2 AND s.STTS_NO != 3 AND s.STTS_NO != 4 AND s.STTS_NO != 5 AND s.STTS_NO != 6 AND s.STTS_NO != 7
AND s.STTS_NO != 1 AND s.STTS_NO != 2 AND s.STTS_NO != 3 AND s.STTS_NO != 4 AND s.STTS_NO != 7 AND s.STTS_NO != 8 AND s.STTS_NO != 9 AND h.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND ( CASE WHEN s.STTS_NO = 5 THEN 'SR 요청이 개발중 입니다.' WHEN s.STTS_NO = 6 THEN 'SR 요청이 개발완료 되었습니다.' WHEN s.STTS_NO = 10 THEN 'SR 요청에 대한 계획 조정 요청 입니다.' END) = sa.MESSAGE
AND MESSAGE_CHECK = 'N' AND s.SR_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT sa.ALARM_NO AS "alarmNo", sa.USER_NO AS "userNo", sa.MESSAGE AS "message", sa.MESSAGE_CHECK AS "messageCheck", sa.MESSAGE_DATE AS "messageDate", sa.ALARM_PRY AS "alarmPry", sa.ALARM_TTL AS "alarmTtl", sa.ALARM_CATEGORY AS "alarmCategory", sa.SR_NO AS "srNo", st.STTS_NM AS "sttsNM" FROM SR_ALARM sa, SR s,SR_STTS st, HR h WHERE sa.SR_NO = s.SR_NO(+) AND s.STTS_NO = st.STTS_NO(+) AND s.SR_NO = h.SR_NO(+)
AND sa.SR_NO like #{sysNo} AND sa.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND s.STTS_NO != 8 AND s.STTS_NO != 10
AND sa.SR_NO like #{sysNo} AND s.STTS_NO != 2 AND s.STTS_NO != 3 AND s.STTS_NO != 4 AND s.STTS_NO != 5 AND s.STTS_NO != 6 AND s.STTS_NO != 7
AND s.STTS_NO != 1 AND s.STTS_NO != 2 AND s.STTS_NO != 3 AND s.STTS_NO != 4 AND s.STTS_NO != 7 AND s.STTS_NO != 8 AND s.STTS_NO != 9 AND h.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND ( CASE WHEN s.STTS_NO = 5 THEN 'SR 요청이 개발중 입니다.' WHEN s.STTS_NO = 6 THEN 'SR 요청이 개발완료 되었습니다.' WHEN s.STTS_NO = 10 THEN 'SR 요청에 대한 계획 조정 요청 입니다.' END) = sa.MESSAGE
AND s.SR_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY MESSAGE_CHECK, DECODE(s.STTS_NO, 1, 8, 10, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 9) ASC, MESSAGE_DATE DESC
SELECT s.SR_NO AS "srNo", s.SR_CUST_NO AS "userNo", st.STTS_NM AS "sttsNm", s.SR_TTL AS "srTtl" FROM SR s, SR_STTS st WHERE s.STTS_NO = st.STTS_NO AND s.SR_NO = #{srNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SR_ALARM( ALARM_NO, USER_NO, MESSAGE, MESSAGE_CHECK, MESSAGE_DATE, ALARM_PRY, ALARM_TTL, SR_NO, ALARM_CATEGORY) VALUES(alarmno_seq.nextval,#{userNo}, #{message},'N',sysdate, #{alarmPry} , #{srTtl}, #{srNo}, #{alarmCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT SYS_NM AS "sysNm", sys.SYS_NO AS "sysNo" FROM USERS u, SYSTEM sys WHERE u.USER_NO = sys.MANAGER_NO AND u.USER_NO = #{userNo}
